html:
6.30.18  9:56 am   6.29.18  2:38 pm how do you know which one best represents the music at hand if you've listened to the song in all the keys and it sounds great in all of them?

      do different keys convey different tones or different emotions?

      how can this be explained since there's no objective definition of a pitch the way there is of a meter or a kilogram?
6.30.18  7:18 am   6.29.18  7:46 pm did that question inspire this tweet: https://twitter.com/billwurtz/status/1012839536739614720?s=21
6.28.18  2:27 pm   6.27.18  4:49 pm What if you feel like you are missing a note though, and can't quite pick it out? Or what if you don't even know you are missing one entirely?
6.26.18  6:31 pm   6.25.18  7:08 am this is insane. Do you use a multiband compressor ? If not I think you should look into it
6.26.18  11:16 am   6.25.18  8:32 pm ok man, i JUST checked, and it is not there.
6.26.18  10:24 am   6.26.18  2:03 am was it intended as a political statement, as opposed to a friendly one?
6.25.18  7:08 am   6.24.18  7:56 am what are some things you learned while mixing the song

6.24.18  11:13 pm   7.13.16  3:46 pm    i think this makes a lot of sense, but there's ths guy i used to like a lot, and we kinda had a thing almost but it all went wrong in the worst way possible, and now every time i run into him he's with this new girl and it spontaneously makes my stomach freeze. and i tried hating her but it's not working cause we're actually a lot alike. i wish i could set my stomach on perma defrost, but the chill always seems to be stronger

6.24.18  6:39 pm   6.24.18  4:58 pm a. you didn't answer the question and b. good, because I finished it in just a little over a day,

     and what you'd posted there has really resonated with me, and i know that i'm not like a 10000000000 people, but reality makes a lot of people happy (from what i've gathered here), so please continue, thank you
6.24.18  6:22 pm   6.24.18  3:07 am this isn't a democracy but i think most people still use headphone, especially when listening to music
6.24.18  3:29 am   6.23.18  1:39 am by that do u mean you wanted to finish it before you left for vidcon and could not if you made the ending less abrupt i.e. longer

6.23.18  9:49 pm   why do you always swear

6.16.18  2:43 pm
6.23.18  6:54 pm   6.22.18  9:34 am   is that the longest question you've ever got or answered?

6.23.18  5:51 pm   6.22.18  5:49 pm well, i'm actually having a problem playing really quickly on guitar. i can play 3rds in a C maj scale (1,3,2,4,(or c,e,d,f) and so on) as 16th notes at 113bpm. but i'm having like a physical problem with my hand.

      i don't know if that's not supposed to happen and I'm holding my guitar weirdly or that's normal and i just need to suck it up and plow through it.

      being alone i'm forced with the latter, but i guess it's not too bad being trapped at 113bpm.
6.21.18  4:22 pm   6.20.18  8:14 pm how did this person know tell me
6.18.18  5:14 pm   6.15.18  7:38 pm Now I'm curious. What are the intermediary steps? Like cultural interpretation, or like the way sound frequencies mix in the air? Or like tornados perhaps
6.18.18  9:00 am   6.17.18  6:07 am then how did the first genius become a genius?
6.18.18  2:42 am   6.16.18  11:46 pm that's funny af, but really... how?

6.17.18  12:51 am   Follow up to the screaming children question (6.15.18  3:45 pm ) I've tried this, and it's fun for a while but then they take the screaming as an invitation to make me run around with them & play their games. Which sometimes is tiring. So what could I do to make them be quiet without moving :)

6.16.18  2:06 pm   6.15.18  1:32 pm Wait what you haven't used a green screen before? Then dang I'm even more proud of you than I was before. What did you use to get yourself to appear in videos before?
6.15.18  10:00 pm   7.24.17  3:29 am hey! why don't you just do this again???
6.14.18  4:32 pm   6.13.18  2:10 pm If you were in Super Smash Brothersâ„¢, what would be you best move?

6.11.18  7:31 pm   judging from your answers to other questions you seem to believe in revenge in the form of eye-for-an-eye and so forth (most recent example 6.10.18  12:34 am ). how universally can this principal be applied?
6.10.18  10:37 am   5.12.17  11:10 pm - what made you change your mind to making videos with your new songs?

6.6.18  3:00 pm   Hi, I'm the folk who asked the channel trailer question. I usually find them dull as well, unless they are self referential, or stand out from the crowd. Do you believe this too, or have channel trailers pretty much just become the white noise of YouTube?

6.3.18  7:00 am

6.6.18  11:51 am   hey there was a question i asked that you didn't answer and i wanna re ask it with better wording to hopefully show the importance but i forgot the question can you remind me

sure

5.11.18  8:19 pm   Referring to your answer at 5.11.18  10:29 am , I'm suspicious that you didn't actually do the research on this one. Google tells me that individual workers weigh on average between 1 to 5 mg, so even at the low end we are talking about 90,718 ants and potentially up to 453,592 ants. Now having been caught in this lie what do you have to say for yourself?
5.11.18  7:40 pm   3.29.17  3:32 pm What were they?
5.10.18  3:28 pm   5.9.18  12:16 pm can you tell me a bit more about how to know how it goes?

4.26.18  10:21 am

     have you ever been to the moon or some other region of space?

5.7.18  1:40 am   I've noticed that many of your videos talk about going (or attempting to go) home, why?

4.29.18  5:57 pm

5.6.18  8:57 am   5.4.18  9:04 pm Your 'war on theory' is so weird.  

     Music is just as made up as theory.  

     And you've gotten it wrong anyway.  You're getting theory and convention confused, I guess?  

     Also, the music you make doesn't defy theory in any way, at all, ever.  

     In fact, you very clearly have a theoretical base in Western pop music.  

     Ideas and concepts have been transferred to you, whether through deliberate study or not.  

     And that's okay.  Just let it go.

5.5.18  11:16 pm   5.5.18  4:13 am   I am from the genre police, Starostin Division,

      hello. I would classify your music as Pop Rock, Meta Rock, and maybe Jazz or Folk Rock too, depending on the song. Pop Rock because of your stated hypnotic approach (where every moment is designed to hold interest), and Meta Rock because your music often feels like a parody of music itself (kinda like Ween or Frank Zappa). How would you escape from this classification,

     and why?

5.5.18  4:13 am   5.3.18  3:29 pm what genre would your music be classified in

     and do you have any sites where i can read more on this genre

5.5.18  1:23 am   5.4.18  3:09 am
I thought it was the one with the pancake roof or whatever

2.14.18  5:04 pm2.8.18  4:00 pm2.1.18  11:05 pm1.30.18  7:45 pm1.30.18  5:36 pm
5.4.18  6:48 pm   5.28.17  1:18 pm compared to what?

5.4.18  12:20 pm   5.3.18  7:41 pm What about doing simple graphics? Don't misunderstand me, I LOVE your videos and I think they've gotten crazier over time, with all the 3D stuff, and movement, and detailed backgrounds, and wild colors etc. But doing simple, more minimalistic videos would let you do more songs at a faster rate, but still have a video to put up for your big youtube audience. Maybe find a balance between doing some wild and crazy videos and doing some videos with that more minimal style (like dont wanna go to school, free to do whatever, jodie foster, diamond, etc.)?
5.3.18  7:53 pm   In reference to 3.22.17  3:44 pm : what about another sequel to bookstacking?
5.3.18  7:41 pm   5.3.18  8:52 am Why don't you do that thing you did back in 2014, where you had a little spinning disc with the song playing?
5.3.18  5:04 pm   5.2.18  9:10 pm Not the asker but that same logic applies to job interviews, right?
